about:
I'm ZKS Share IT!
You can anonymous share any telegram files and get the sharing link using this bot!

💡Just send me something!💡

/help for more details...
instant_share: Send content that will be instant shared to ur previous chat
error:
Error: [Message does not exist]
/help for more details...
info:
Supported file types:
- Text✏️

- Video🎥
- Audio🎵
- Photo📷
- Document📁
- Sticker🖼
- GIF🎞
- Voice note🎤
- Video note🔘
- Media groups(albums)🗂
 If bot didn't respond, contact @CREATOR_USERNAME
description_help: 💡you can set a caption by a double space.💡
